namespace.description: The namespace to which application will be deployed.

chartName.description: Name of the deployed chart (use only if it differes from .name)

repoURL.description: URL of chart repository, oci resource or argocd git repo

repoPath.description: If repoURL is ArgoCD git repo, this is the path inside the repo to look in

psp.description: Pod security policy for given namespace.

serverSideApply.description: Apply all the manifests (and diffs) server-side. Useful for large resources.

selfHeal.description: Automatically sync, when cluster state diverges from application state.

retries.description: Number of retries, before giving up. Set to -1 for indefinite.

ignoreDifferences.description: IgnoreDifferences is a list of resources and their fields which should be ignored during comparison. Will be passed directly to application.

syncOptions.description: Options allow you to specify whole app sync-options. 'CreateNamespace=true' is passed by default.

values.description: Default helm chart values, expected to be shared between the clusters
